Release details, version LTS.397.4
Patch LTS.397.4 of February 7, 2024
Changes and improvements
Improvements in adding/removing nested template instances to/from all document versions.
Patch LTS.397.3 of February 5, 2024
Changes and improvements
Improvements in the algorithm for comparing bookmark values.
Patch LTS.397.2 of February 2, 2024
Changes and improvements
Optimizations in attribute creation settings.
Patch LTS.397.1 of February 1, 2024
Changes and improvements
The process of exporting diagrams when working with dashboards was stabilized;
Improvements in the "Control element" analytical panel on dashboards transferred to the application with GUF files.
Update package LTS.397.0 of January 30, 2024
New features
A new field with API was added to the mobile app to show video duration.
It’s now possible to use images instead of the "graph" chart.
A closeModalWindow action was added.
A possibility to easily switch between bookmark parent objects was added to electronic documents.
A possibility to redefine action by clicking "OK" was added to modal windows.
Changes and improvements
A reference search was implemented through localObject deleting;
Object management improvements: it’s not more possible to clear mandatory attributes of object and child object types when deleting linked objects;
Corrections in attribute visual names and descriptions;
Chain attributes will now be hidden for attrByVar function when using the "Set value" sign;
Favorites were added to search filter settings;
Improvements in creating child attribute instances;
Stabilization in subject area viewing;
Improvements in numberToWords function;
Improvements in editing filtering algorithms in modal windows;
Setting updates in viewing algorithms in calculated indicator registry;
Optimizations in settings for tasks with deferred start;
Stabilizations in message editing in GreenData messenger.
